name: I2C_LCD_DN
description: This library was created to display digital clock numbers fullsize on a 4x20 LCD. The I2C-Master library from Peter Fleury is used for the I2C-connection. The I2C-LCD initialization for a 4x20 LCD is already integrated in this Library.
keywords: twi, lcd, i2c,digitalnumber, dn, hitachi, hd44780U
